version_description:
1. Optimize part of UI
2. Fix some bugs

1. Optimize part of UI
2. Fix some bugs

1. Optimize part of UI
2. Fix some bugs
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

1. New Legion League mode: Now available to players Lv. 55+ from the Arena on weekends for a limited time
2. Expanded the existing Achievement system
3. Removed the Combat Strength requirements for moving onto the next map while idle
4. Arena Revenge can now only be pursued once
5. Added Purchase and Refresh confirmations in the Shop
6. Replaced Hero's "Armor" attribute with "Defense". Calculations have been redone
7. Optimized the account system. Added password recovery functions
8. Now supports new languages: Simplified Chinese, French, German
9. Optimized UI
10. Various bug fixes

If you have any suggestions or questions about the game, please contact us.
E-mail address: taptapheroes.feedback@gmail.com

1. Added a new system "Planet Trial"
2. Added new hero: Horde - Blood Teeth,Undead - Jack
3. Adjusted "Avatar" system
4. Adjusted the Awakening Condition of 6-9 Heroes
5. Added 4 new Auras

1. Added a new system "Planet Trial"
2. Added new hero: Horde - Blood Teeth,Undead - Jack
3. Adjusted "Avatar" system
4. Adjusted the Awakening Condition of 6-9 Heroes

1. Added a new system "Planet Trial"
2. Added new hero: Horde - Blood Teeth,Undead - Jack
3. Adjusted "Avatar" system
4. Adjusted the Awakening Condition of 6-9 Heroes
5. Added 4 new Auras

1. New hero: Elf-Vegvisir
2. Adjusted backpack capacity
3. Optimized Events system
4. Optimized hero comment system. Added Likes function
5. Bulking buying is available for partial goods in the shop
6. "Skip battle" unlocked in advance at lvl 60
7. Optimized Familiar appearance of the 3rd tier
8. New goods in the soul store: Ripper fragment*50
9. Idling waves decreased in the mid-late stage

1. New content: Guild War
2. New heroes：Heaven-Mars; Hell-Chessia
3. Expeditions adjustment
-Hero energy saved in Expeditions after one battle
-Random BUFF available after passing partly floors
4. Awakening License adjustment:
-Awakening Licenses randomly appear in the Shop
-Awakening License price dropped to 150 Legion shields in Legion shop
-Awakening License available in Fantasy Shop
5. Added hero story. Check in Backpack and Gallery
6. A third row of heroes can be added to the idling lineup
7. Hero balance: reduce 10% HP of Monkey King

1. Hero skin system: partial skins available
2. New heroes：Horde-Lexar; Undead-Aden
3. Add advanced wheel and UP chest system
4. Add Elite 5-star hero Chest in Wonder Event (Keys can be obtained in the next Unique events)
5. New languages: Thai, Hindi, Arabic
6. Adjust products and price in Shop
7. Other optimizations

1、加入新英雄：天堂战士-布蕾希尔
2、加入新皮肤
-布蕾希尔 龙血武神
-林德伯格 蔚蓝之锋
-克萨诺斯 绯红之刺
3、神器进阶-月神的淬炼活动可进阶神话品质
4、高级转盘玩法调整
5、新增：酒馆一键派遣功能
6、魔塔争夺战：功能调整优化
7、月神宝藏新增：艾尔温
8、精英英雄宝箱新增：伊戈、艾尔温
